pos_mean_info_list.mean: 有民间风味的；和气的；无拘束的

通俗词源；词的通俗变化
对社会有恶劣影响的人

bilingual.source: There are many traditional folk stories about this festival.
bilingual.target: 关于这个节日有许多传统民间故事。

bilingual.source: Tell your partner a folk story or fable that you know.
bilingual.target: 告诉你的伙伴一个你知道的民间故事或寓言。

bilingual.source: Some typical themes of Chinese New Year paintings are folk tales and gods.
bilingual.target: 一些典型的中国新年画主题是民间故事和神灵。

bilingual.source: She is an expert in folk dance.

bilingual.target: 他喜欢收集民间艺术品。
民间音乐让人感到放松。

bilingual.source: Folk tales are very popular in China.
bilingual.target: 民间故事在中国很受欢迎。

bilingual.source: Every country has its own folk story.
bilingual.target: 每个国家都有自己的民间故事。

bilingual.source: He is an expert in folk art and crafts.
bilingual.target: 他是民间艺术和手工艺的专家。

bilingual.source: She can tell many interesting folk stories.
bilingual.target: 她会讲很多有趣的民间故事。

list.abstract: FOLK指每个民族的传统歌曲，简称民歌。民歌起源于或流传于一个国家、地区的老百姓中间，并成为他们独特文化一部分的歌曲，民间文学的一种。劳动人民的诗歌创作，一般是口头创作、口头流传，并在流传过程中不断经过集体的加工。民歌的特点是表达劳动人民的思想、感情、意志、要求和愿望，具有强烈的现实性，是各民族文艺中的一个重要组成部分。
FOLK，英语单词，名词、形容词，作名词时意为“民族；人们；亲属（复数）；(Folk)人名；(英、匈、捷)福克”，作形容词时意为“民间的”。

yingyinNormal.en: Take the family to Wild Wadi World, and splash out on over thirty rides, themed around Arabian folk tales.
yingyinNormal.zh: 带同全家大小，前往以阿拉伯民间故事为主题的狂野溪流水上乐园，畅玩超过三十个机动游戏。

yingyinNormal.en: Today this ancient fighting tradition is not just part of Chinese folk law, but has seeped into western popular culture too.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当今这个古老的战斗传统已经不仅仅是中国的民间习俗，它也浸润了西方流行文化。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, well, what do you want to do? There's a craft and folk art museum on Wilshire. Well, that's Wilshire's problem.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，那你想做什么？威尔希尔那边有一个手工艺与民间艺术馆。那是威尔希尔那边的人倒霉。

yingyinNormal.en: These are good folk around here, who care about one another.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这里的人都是好人，每个人都关心对方

yingyinNormal.en: No, it was the dream. We are noodle folk. Broth runs through our veins.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，这是那个“梦”，我们是面条世家，我们的血管里流淌着高汤。

yingyinNormal.en: So what are you girls? Writers? Folk duo? Just bitches? Nailed it, loser.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你俩是干嘛的？作家，民谣组合，还是贱人一对？说对了，屌丝。

yingyinNormal.en: Muggle? Non-magic folk. This boy's had his name down ever since you were born.
yingyinNormal.zh: 麻瓜？不懂魔法的人，这孩子自从你出生之前就注册了。

yingyinNormal.en: Because if you do, you'll see them as they really are, degenerate carnival folk.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不然，你就会看到原来他们是堕落的风流浪子。

yingyinNormal.en: Your destiny still awaits. We are noodle folk. Broth runs deep through our veins.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你真正的宿命还在等着你，我们是面条世家，血管里流的是高汤哦。

yingyinNormal.en: In one kingdom lived folk like you and me with a vain and greedy king to rule over them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其中一个王国，住着和你我一样的平民百姓，他们被自负又贪婪的国王奴役着。

yingyinNormal.en: Perhaps I can explain. You see, my cousins are simple folk. Watch. A, B, C... Nothing. See? Nothing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这件事我可以解释，诸位，我的远房亲戚都很单纯，瞧着A B C... 不会唱，瞧？他不会。

yingyinNormal.en: He is just a front for Wolfshiem, a gangster to get his claws into respectable folk like Walter Chase.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他只不过是沃尔夫山姆的马前卒，引诱沃尔特·切斯这样的上流人士上钩的小弟。

yingyinNormal.en: They beg for scraps, like poor Agathe. This is our world, Belle. For simple folk like us, it doesn't getting better.
yingyinNormal.zh: 会像阿加特那样靠乞讨为生。这就是现实，贝儿。像我们这穷乡僻壤的，还有什么可挑的。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not surprised. A well-known folk cure for insomnia is to break in your neighbor's apartment and clean. Sarcasm? You think?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一点也不感到奇怪，失眠的灵丹妙药就是闯到邻居家里打扫。讽刺？你觉得是吗？

yingyinNormal.en: So what makes you say that? You military folk have all the same tells. Posture, the hair, it's like they make you in a factory.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为什么这么说？你们这些军人的作风都一样，姿势，头发，简直就像工厂批量生产的。

yingyinNormal.en: The worst thing about the woods is you never know what you're gonna run into a bear, a hunter who doesn't take kindly to city folk, or worse...
yingyinNormal.zh: 身处森林最坏的事，就是你永远不知道会遇到什么，一只熊，一个不喜欢城里人的猎人，更糟的是...

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: people in general; a certain kind, class, or group of people

examination_example.sentence: The value of work is also driving <highlight>folks</highlight> to continue working past retirement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工作的价值也驱使人们在退休后继续工作。

examination_example.sentence: A tide of emigration — one of the great <highlight>folk</highlight> wanderings of history — swept from Europe to America.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一股移民潮——史上最大的人类迁徙之一——从欧洲横扫到美洲。

examination_example.sentence: Along with the many <highlight>folks</highlight> looking to make a permanent home in the United States came those who had no intention to stay.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多人希望在美国建立永久家园，但也有人无意长留于此。

sense_info_list.en: relating to the traditional art or culture of a community or nation; originating from the beliefs and opinions of ordinary people

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 民俗；民间信仰；传说；民间传说

word_family.mean: pl-n. 人们；民间音乐；各位；大伙儿；家属

sense_info_list.en: people in general; a certain kind, class, or group of people

examination_example.sentence: These books reflect a trend, particularly strong in Britain, where swimming in pools is declining, but more and more <highlight>folks</highlight> are opting for open water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些书反映了一种趋势，尤其是在英国，在那里，选择在游泳池游泳的人不断减少，而越来越多的人选择在开放水域游泳。

sense_info_list.en: relating to the traditional art or culture of a community or nation; originating from the beliefs and opinions of ordinary people

examination_example.sentence: Common <highlight>folks</highlight>'scientific knowledge can sway policy making.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 普通人的科学知识可以左右政策的制定。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>

word_family.mean: pl-n. 人们；民间音乐；各位；大伙儿；家属

examination_example.sentence: And then he would donate them to <highlight>folks</highlight> who could truly use them but didn't have the budget to buy one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后他会把它们捐给那些真正能用上它们但没有预算去买的人。

examination_example.sentence: Six days a week, up and down the red hills of northeast Georgia, my grandfather brought the mail to the <highlight>folks</highlight> there.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我祖父每周有六天在佐治亚州东北部的红色山丘上来回奔波，把邮件送给那里的人们。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 民间艺术；民俗艺术；民间美术
民间故事；民俗故事；民间传说

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Folk</highlight> artists can’t shape expensive materials into works of art.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 民间艺术家无法将昂贵的材料塑造成艺术品。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Folk</highlight> art is art made by common people who have not been trained as artists.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 民间艺术是由没有受过艺术家训练的普通人创作的艺术。

examination_example.sentence: There are many little libraries in <highlight>folks</highlight>' front yards, sharing the joy of reading with anyone who passes by.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们前院有很多小图书馆，与路过的人分享阅读的乐趣。
